Question: This person also briefly hosted a talk show on MSNBC from July 2002 to March 2003.
Hints: The television program, also known as this person, was the first talk show format that included audience participation.
In 2006, this person served as co-director with independent filmmaker Ellen Spiro for the feature documentary film Body of War.
